title: The Jackbox Party Starter
notes: Steam reviews are Very Positive (88% of 677). Metacritic metascore 70 with user score 7.3; blended to mid‑80s.
raw_comment: 3 party games, phones as controllers: Quiplash 3 (3 -8 players), Tee K.O. (3-8 players ), Trivia Murder Party 2 (1-8 players), English, French, Italian, German and Spanish.
